title: Ep. 57 - The End of America
itunes:title: The End of America
description: Porter Stansberry, founder of Stansberry Investment Research, talks about his shocking “End of America” video. Chris Mayer, editor of Capital & Crisis and Mayer’s Special Situations, recommends investing in Africa and select rare earth companies.  Watch the shocking free video at
